problem_names:
lemma larger_in_consump_set:
  "x \<in> consumption_set \<and> y \<ge> x \<Longrightarrow> y \<in> consumption_set"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> consumption_set \<Longrightarrow> (0::'a) \<le> x

lemma larger_in_consump_set:
  "x \<in> consumption_set \<and> y \<ge> x \<Longrightarrow> y \<in> consumption_set"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> consumption_set \<and> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
    y \<in> consumption_set

proof (prove)
using this:
  arrow_debreu_consum_set consumption_set
  arrow_debreu_consum_set ?consumption_set \<equiv>
  (?consumption_set \<subseteq> {x. (0::?'a) \<le> x} \<and>
   closed ?consumption_set) \<and>
  convex ?consumption_set \<and>
  ?consumption_set \<noteq> {} \<and>
  (\<forall>M\<in>?consumption_set. \<forall>x>M. x \<in> ?consumption_set)
  (?b \<le> ?a) = (?b < ?a \<or> ?a = ?b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> consumption_set \<and> x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow>
    y \<in> consumption_set
